info.name: Feedly Cleaner
info.description: Cleans up feedly UI & makes more space for actual articles.
info.additionalInfo:
2013.12.01
added minor tweak because of one webcomics rss-feed cutting the comic image with css

2013.11.26
fixed to work with simplified feedly.com domain (ie, feedly url changed a bit).

2013.06.30
fixed image-links which had clickable area outside of the image

2013.06.20
made news content wider

2013.06.19.
fixed for new cloud version of feedly.
